Desc.eng: I told you cutting into that sleeping Creaker was a bad idea!
But you were bragging about your new axe! I had to take a swing!
Two stranded souls... and still arguing. How cute.
Look, we got eaten alive by a tree and now we can't leave until our remains are buried at this altar.
And let me guess, you want me to play fetch bones?
Yes. Being dead and stuck here for eternity with this mutton is stressing.
There is enough trouble in the forest already, I'll help you.
We have more pressing matters at hand, sorry...
